title: 靠！你地班仆街黄尸唔好搞到我返唔到工！

replies.msg:
㕷們呢啲沉默大多數最鍾意返工，你叫我罷工？警察殺幾多人我都唔會理你。

你哋千祈唔好好似612 嗰日咁，610就預告會喺中環金鐘一帶搞大型集會，搞到好多喺中環嘅公司，都因為驚危險，同交通有問題，預先叫員工唔好返工。

你地唔係唔知，有返咁上下規模嘅公司都有contingency plan，如果工作環境附近有危險，就會要求員工唔好番公司，出咗事保險唔陪㗎，要公司自己食！

我喺觀塘，太古，銅鑼灣，尖沙咀返工嗰啲朋友都好怕你哋話要喺佢哋公司附近集會，搞到佢哋啲公司都叫啲員工唔好返工。

你哋搞罷工，我真係唔怕你，我敢肯定，超過一半香港人都唔會聽你地講照樣返工，咁你就以為可以搞到香港嘅商業運作，冇可能。就算地鐵工會搞罷工，我都咁肯定佢哋一定夠人繼續維持運作。

但係如果預告集會令到啲公司主動叫員工唔好返，就係成間公司運作唔到，咁香港經濟真係俾你地玩死。

好多黃屍老闆或公司管理層，根本就係想搞罷工，但係冇藉口，你哋咁樣俾咗個靚藉口佢哋，真係多得你地唔少。

仲有呀，你哋啲黃屍仲唔會趁公司比張牌你上，公司叫你哋唔使返工，真係出晒去集會咩。咁咪好多人！

你班仆街！只要你地
1）揀啱集會地點focus 喺商業區
2）提早一段時間做文宣，預告比全世界聽會有大型集會
3）公司自然就會主動叫唔使返工
4）就會有好多人唔使驚秋後算帳，可以出嚟集會
5）集會人數就好多
6）集會人多，之後嗰日公司都只能夠繼續叫員工繼續唔番

咁就搞成一個self fulfilling 嘅罷工，仲可以持續多日！

仲比我係Starbucks 聽到個美軍教個0靚仔係自己公司individually 可以點幫手促成罷工

1） 罷工前幾日send email 比管理層同HR (可匿名)，問佢哋罷工當日如果同事返工發生意外邊個負責

2. Cc 大量同事，要公司回應

真係好嬲，你哋千祈唔好可以咁做！

sample email 85罷工 - 要求管理層根據勞工法例保障員工安全
https://lih.kg/1392821
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區

Subject
Please ensure the safety of our staff on 5th August Strike

Content
Dear Management and HR

According to sources as diverse as newspaper headlines (see attached link below) and various discussions on Facebook and web forums, a major strike is expected on 5th August (next Monday), with large scale assembly is also expected in our area. I am worried for both public safety and public transportation logistics for the day.

According to OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY AND HEALTH ORDINANCE, CHAPTER 509, Employers should contribute to safety and health in their workplaces by: 
* providing and maintaining safe access to and egress from the workplaces; and 
* providing and maintaining a safe and healthy work environment 

May I seek a clarification on management’s plan?

News- HK protesters call for citywide strike on August 5
https://www.asiatimes.com/2019/07/article/hk-protesters-call-for-citywide-strike-on-august-5

所有問題去到最後只會追究到主權問題，希望大家思考下。

推到有巴打拍出黎
罷工潮文

今晚，我又再一次訓唔著。
睇到一幕幕血淋淋嘅畫面，我望唔透，我唔想香港咁亂，點解香港人咁唔肯服輸？我抱住我小朋友，關上電視。
我唔知應該講咩好，作為成年人我深知道反對係無用。

勇武抗爭？只會換嚟被捕同前途盡毀。
作為三大畢業嘅我，作為小朋友爸爸嘅我，睇到真係得啖笑。

五大訴求？喺依張國際焦點的賭枱上到底香港人知唔知道自己有幾多籌碼喺手？咁樣同我走去李嘉誠面前話要賭一千萬有咩分別？

望住天花板，喺我老婆旁邊我諗起另一個女人。今日返屋企嘅途中，收到一張傳單。係由一個弱質纖纖嘅少女手上得到，我同佢對望，點一點頭。我嘅目光無停留喺佢嘅面上，係因為我怕佢睇得出我尷尬嘅眼神。

傳單上面寫住「5/8全民大罷工」，我有老婆，有仔女，有父母要養，重有一層樓要供。罷工？唔係我唔想支持，係我有太多責任，我放唔低，香港有邊個唔係手停口停嘅呢？

一日又一日過去，每日平常的工作，令我好疲累，返到屋企開電視，又係一樣嘅新聞，一樣嘅結果，分別只係今日警察到底放左催淚彈，真槍定係水炮車。我合上雙眼，我問自己，乜野係啱，乜野係錯？

終於到左5/8，我老婆照常叫我起身，換好恤衫，我望住我個仔，雙眼開始模糊。

我無返到公司，走上街頭。
依一刻，我知道咩叫責任。

Dear XXX

The controversial extradition bill has sent Hong Kong into an unparalleled chaos over the course of the past two months. I'm writing to seek your clarification on the firm's contingency plan, and would like to propose the following:

The firm is to impose a flexible work arrangement day on 5 Aug, any non-critical staff may take a personal leave for the day. This is to take into consideration of staff safety, traffic disruption/delay, and to respect the will of those who wish to participate in the strike.

Grateful if HR could issue internal communication to all staff by noon 2 Aug on the contingency arrangements.

Best Regards,
A group of concerned staff.

㕷們呢啲沉默大多數最鍾意返工，你叫我罷工？警察殺幾多人我都唔會理你。

你哋千祈唔好好似612 嗰日咁，610就預告會喺中環金鐘一帶搞大型集會，搞到好多喺中環嘅公司，都因為驚危險，同交通有問題，預先叫員工唔好返工。

你地唔係唔知，有返咁上下規模嘅公司都有contingency plan，如果工作環境附近有危險，就會要求員工唔好番公司，出咗事保險唔陪㗎，要公司自己食！

我喺觀塘，太古，銅鑼灣，尖沙咀返工嗰啲朋友都好怕你哋話要喺佢哋公司附近集會，搞到佢哋啲公司都叫啲員工唔好返工。

你哋搞罷工，我真係唔怕你，我敢肯定，超過一半香港人都唔會聽你地講照樣返工，咁你就以為可以搞到香港嘅商業運作，冇可能。就算地鐵工會搞罷工，我都咁肯定佢哋一定夠人繼續維持運作。

但係如果預告集會令到啲公司主動叫員工唔好返，就係成間公司運作唔到，咁香港經濟真係俾你地玩死。

好多黃屍老闆或公司管理層，根本就係想搞罷工，但係冇藉口，你哋咁樣俾咗個靚藉口佢哋，真係多得你地唔少。

仲有呀，你哋啲黃屍仲唔會趁公司比張牌你上，公司叫你哋唔使返工，真係出晒去集會咩。咁咪好多人！

你班仆街！只要你地
1）揀啱集會地點focus 喺商業區
2）提早一段時間做文宣，預告比全世界聽會有大型集會
3）公司自然就會主動叫唔使返工
4）就會有好多人唔使驚秋後算帳，可以出嚟集會
5）集會人數就好多
6）集會人多，之後嗰日公司都只能夠繼續叫員工繼續唔番

咁就搞成一個self fulfilling 嘅罷工，仲可以持續多日！

仲比我係Starbucks 聽到個美軍教個0靚仔係自己公司individually 可以點幫手促成罷工

1） 罷工前幾日send email 比管理層同HR (可匿名)，問佢哋罷工當日如果同事返工發生意外邊個負責

2. Cc 大量同事，要公司回應

真係好嬲，你哋千祈唔好可以咁做！

Please ensure the safety of our staff on 5th August Strike

Content
Dear Management and HR

According to sources as diverse as newspaper headlines (see attached link below) and various discussions on Facebook and web forums, a major strike is expected on 5th August (next Monday), with large scale assembly is also expected in our area. I am worried for both public safety and public transportation logistics for the day.

According to OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY AND HEALTH ORDINANCE, CHAPTER 509, Employers should contribute to safety and health in their workplaces by: 
* providing and maintaining safe access to and egress from the workplaces; and 
* providing and maintaining a safe and healthy work environment 

May I seek a clarification on management’s plan?

Dear XXX

The controversial extradition bill has sent Hong Kong into an unparalleled chaos over the course of the past two months. The situation has morphed from peaceful demonstrations to civil disobedience, with increasing amount of force used by both protesters and police. Various sources from news and social media suggested that demonstrators are calling for a city-wide strike with large scale assemblies in 7 districts and also disruptions of MTR service on 5 August, 2019.

I'm writing to seek your clarification on the firm's contingency plan, and would like to propose the following:

The firm is to impose a flexible work arrangement day on 5 Aug, any non-critical staff may take a personal leave for the day. This is to take into consideration of staff safety, traffic disruption/delay, and to respect the will of those who wish to participate in the strike.

Grateful if HR could issue internal communication to all staff by noon 2 Aug on the contingency arrangements.

Best Regards,
A group of concerned staff.

你地唔係唔知，有返咁上下規模嘅公司都有contingency plan，如果工作環境附近有危險，就會要求員工唔好番公司，出咗事保險唔陪㗎，要公司自己食！

我喺觀塘，太古，銅鑼灣，尖沙咀返工嗰啲朋友都好怕你哋話要喺佢哋公司附近集會，搞到佢哋啲公司都叫啲員工唔好返工。

好多黃屍老闆或公司管理層，根本就係想搞罷工，但係冇藉口，你哋咁樣俾咗個靚藉口佢哋，真係多得你地唔少。

According to sources as diverse as newspaper headlines (see attached link below) and various discussions on Facebook and web forums, a major strike is expected on 5th August (next Monday), with large scale assembly is also expected in our area. According to OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY AND HEALTH ORDINANCE, CHAPTER 509, Employers should contribute to safety and health in their workplaces by:

Dear XXX

The controversial extradition bill has sent Hong Kong into an unparalleled chaos over the course of the past two months. The situation has morphed from peaceful demonstrations to civil disobedience, with increasing amount of force used by both protesters and police. Various sources from news and social media suggested that demonstrators are calling for a city-wide strike with large scale assemblies in 7 districts and also disruptions of MTR service on 5 August, 2019.

I'm writing to seek your clarification on the firm's contingency plan, and would like to propose the following:

The firm is to impose a flexible work arrangement day on 5 Aug, any non-critical staff may take a personal leave for the day. This is to take into consideration of staff safety, traffic disruption/delay, and to respect the will of those who wish to participate in the strike.

Grateful if HR could issue internal communication to all staff by noon 2 Aug on the contingency arrangements.

Best Regards,
A group of concerned staff.

Subject
Please ensure the safety of our staff on 5th August Strike

Content
Dear Management and HR

According to sources as diverse as newspaper headlines (see attached link below) and various discussions on Facebook and web forums, a major strike is expected on 5th August (next Monday), with large scale assembly is also expected in our area. I am worried for both public safety and public transportation logistics for the day.

According to OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY AND HEALTH ORDINANCE, CHAPTER 509, Employers should contribute to safety and health in their workplaces by: 
* providing and maintaining safe access to and egress from the workplaces; and 
* providing and maintaining a safe and healthy work environment 

May I seek a clarification on management’s plan?

News- HK protesters call for citywide strike on August 5
https://www.asiatimes.com/2019/07/article/hk-protesters-call-for-citywide-strike-on-august-5

Thanks!
推~
